com.solacesystems.jcsmp

Class JCSMPLoginFailureException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.apache.commons.lang.exception.NestableException
          • com.solacesystems.common.ChainedException
            • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.JCSMPException
              • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.JCSMPOperationException
                • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.JCSMPLoginFailureException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.commons.lang.exception.Nestable

    public class JCSMPLoginFailureException
extends JCSMPOperationException
    Indicates a producer or consumer was unable to login to the 3200 Series appliance.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • JCSMPLoginFailureException

        public JCSMPLoginFailureException(int user_t,
                                  String userName,
                                  int responseCode,
                                  String responsePhrase)
        Construct a JCSMPLoginFailureException
        Parameters:
        user_t - The type of user the exception is raised for (PRODUCER | CONSUMER).
        userName - The user name of the client that attempted login.
        responseCode - The SMF response code.
        responsePhrase - A short phrase associated with the response code.

    • Method Detail

      • getResponseCode

        public int getResponseCode()
        Get the SMF response code.
        Returns:
        The SMF response code.

      • getResponsePhrase

        public String getResponsePhrase()
        Get the response phrase.
        Returns:
        The phrase associated with the response code, or null if the phrase is not provided.
